segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, flooding the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, polishing a plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is when everything is going wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and the boy is reaching so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little happy that the kids are getting away with it, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, like nothing bad could ever happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
